meanings.definition: Of considerable or relatively great size.
meanings.sent2: The large tree provided shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The large cake was too big for the tiny table.
meanings.sent4: Her large heart was full of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The large mountain loomed in the distance.

meanings.definition: A great extent or range in size.
meanings.sent1: The large of the ocean was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The large of the forest was home to many animals.
meanings.sent3: The large of the playground made it perfect for games.
meanings.sent4: The large of the sky seemed endless.
meanings.sent5: The large of the desert stretched as far as the eye could see.

meanings.sent1: There was a large of people at the concert.
meanings.sent2: The large of books in the library was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The large of balloons filled the room with color.
meanings.sent4: The large of stars in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The large of coins in the jar jingled with each movement.
